values: 摘；采；采摘；摘取；挑选；选择；拾起；捡起；挑剔；弹奏（乐器）；挖掘（矿石等）；剔除；掐去；清理；梳理；偷窃；窃取；撬锁；挑战；挑衅；挖苦；戏弄
选择；拣选；挑选；挑选权；选择权；精选；精品；精华；最佳之选；鹤嘴锄；尖镐；撬棍；挖掘工具

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 采摘；掘，撬开；采得物；赃物
采摘者；采摘机；啄者；挖掘者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指按照一定的规章或法律，用投票等方式进行的认真慎重的选择。
书面用词，具有庄严、正式的感情色彩。强调精选。
口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含任意挑选之意。
强调个人偏爱，不一定有选择的行动。
普通用词，侧重根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行选择，着重被选者的优点。
多指在几种可能性之间进行选择。

word_group.brief_definition: 接电话；挑选；接(人), 搭载；拿起；好转, 提高, 有起色, 增加；变得更猛烈, 变得更强大
挑选出, 辨识出, 挑选
(使)恢复, 补救, 收拾残局

word_group.phrase: have a bone to pick with sb.

word_group.brief_definition: 精挑细选；挑挑拣拣, 挑三拣四, 挑剔
挑选新队员的权力；新选的队员

bilingual.source: Pick one and try to learn more about its history and famous dishes.
bilingual.target: 选择一个并尝试了解它的历史和著名菜肴。

bilingual.source: You need to pick a dress for the party.
bilingual.target: 你需要选择一件礼服参加派对。

bilingual.source: It's hard to pick the best restaurant in town.
bilingual.target: 很难选择镇上最好的餐馆。

bilingual.source: He couldn't pick between the two job offers.
bilingual.target: 他无法在两个工作机会之间选择。

bilingual.source: Can you pick a movie for us to watch tonight?
bilingual.target: 你能选择一部电影让我们今晚观看吗？

bilingual.source: You can choose red or blue, and I suggest you pick the latter.
bilingual.target: 你可以选择红色或蓝色，我建议你选择后者。

bilingual.source: He likes to pick a random place on the map to travel to.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢在地图上选择一个随机的地方去旅行。

bilingual.source: Pick a standard work uniform or a few go-to options.
bilingual.target: 选择一件标准的工作服或一些可供选择的衣服。
没有人选择我去团队合作。

list.abstract: pick（英[pɪk]，美[pɪk]），是英语单词，可作为动词或名词，动词释义为摘、采集、选择，名词释义为选择权、精华，常见词语搭配有pick up（接电话）、pick out（挑选出），例句：I'll pick you up at the station.（我会去车站接你。） 其复数为picks；第三人称单数为picks；现在分词为picking；过去式为picked；过去分词为picked。
pick该单词的中文含义为挑选、选择的意思，出自韩国选秀节目节目《produce101》，你“pick”谁就是支持谁喜欢谁的意思。

yingyinNormal.en: So why did you pick the Millers? Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么选择米勒一家？为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: We'd be lying to you if we told you janitorial services was our first pick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不瞒您说，保洁工作并非我们的第一选择。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess this is the year you're supposed to pick a major and start carving out your path in life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是该选择专业开始铺就人生路的一年。

yingyinNormal.en: So now the students could basically pick deadlines to themselves that will be potentially costly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以现在学生有权利自己选择这些有可能让他们失去分数的最后期限。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I got it. Okay, everyone pick a number from one to 10, all right? Whoever gets the highest number gets to go first.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，有了。大家选择一到十的数字，谁选到最大的数字可以先走。

yingyinNormal.en: All right look, I think it's time for you to settle down. You know? Make a choice, pick a lane. Who's Elaine?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该定下来了做个选择，选一条“路”。谁是伊莱恩？（与“路”谐音）

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I picked it up without thinking about it. Which raises a neuro-scientific question, when did I decide to pick it up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想都没想就挑了这根汤匙。一个神经学的问题就产生了，我什么时候决定选择这根汤匙？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Penny, if it were a game, here are your choices. An e-mail from an old acquaintance, or the head of one of the largest religious institutions in the world slam dunking to "Sweet Georgia Brown." Pick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，如果这是个游戏，你有如下选择：来自老熟人的一封电邮，还是世界上最大宗教机构的领袖在《Sweet Georgia Brown》的歌声中扣篮，挑一个。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, Molly, pick up. Just bloody pick up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，茉莉，接电话，接电话啊。

yingyinNormal.en: You pick that up right now. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你马上给我捡起来。不要。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe we pick names out of a hat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要不还是抓阄决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I have a bone to pick with you, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 捉迷藏的奖品捏。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, just calm down and pick a song.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，消消气。开始选歌吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe pick names out of a hat. Whatever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓阄组队之类的，都可以呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Gentlemen, you're pick. It's All Relative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男生队，轮到你们了。“日常琐事”。

yingyinNormal.en: Pick your ass up and finish what you started.
yingyinNormal.zh: 振作起来，做事不能半途而废。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig is here to pick up Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈来接佩奇和乔治回家了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy Pig is here to pick up Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈来接佩奇和乔治回家了。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you have to go pick up Emily? Yeah. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用去接艾蜜莉吗？要。

yingyinNormal.en: Mowgli, pick me up high! My turn! Stop. Not now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毛克利，把我举高高吧！轮到我了！别这样，现在不行。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (have a bone to pick with sb.)对某人生气

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 采摘者；采集者；采摘机；采集机
v. 采摘；挑选；挑剔；（pick的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 摘；采摘；采集；挑选；选择；拔；拉；撕；扯；挑；捡

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 接电话；挑选；接(人)；搭载；拿起；好转；提高；有起色；增加；变得更猛烈；变得更强大；接收

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: have a bone to pick with sb.

sense_info_list.en: choose someone or something from a number of alternatives, typically after careful thought

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>picked</highlight> two newcomers that were attracting considerable buzz in Silicon Valley.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它选择了两个新成员，这两个新成员在硅谷引起了相当大的反响。

examination_example.sentence: "I wouldn't <highlight>pick</highlight> a year to end print," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说：“我不会选择哪一年停止印刷。”

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>pick</highlight> a date from the past 53 years and know instantly where I was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我能从过去的五十三年中任意挑个日子，并且很快就会知道我当时当时在哪儿。

sense_info_list.en: to take flowers, fruit, etc. from the plant or the tree where they are growing

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>picking</highlight> crops is hard on older bodies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采摘庄稼对老年人来说很难。

examination_example.sentence: In effect, the U.S. can import food or it can import the workers who <highlight>pick</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，美国既可以进口食品，也可以进口采摘食品的工人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pick</highlight> up social signals from non-living rats
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从没有生命的老鼠那里接收社会信号

sense_info_list.en: take hold of and lift or move

examination_example.sentence: We're also giving our customers better channels versus <highlight>picking</highlight> up the phone to accomplish something beyond human scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与拿起手机完成超出人力范围的任务相比，我们还为客户提供了更好的渠道。

examination_example.sentence: Studying this could help understand why human evolution <highlight>picked</highlight> pace in the last 30,000 years, with social environment being a major contributory factor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于社会环境成为了一个主要的促成因素，对此的研究可以有助于理解为什么人类的进化在过去的3万年中有所加速。

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, the highest CEO salaries are paid to outside candidates, not to the cozy insider <highlight>picks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，最高的首席执行官薪水都是支付给外部候选人的，而不是内部精心挑选的候选人。

examination_example.sentence: The move to renewables is <highlight>picking</highlight> up momentum around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在世界各地，向可再生能源转变的势头正在增强。

sense_info_list.zh: (have a bone to pick with sb.)对某人生气

examination_example.sentence: If you have a bone to <highlight>pick</highlight> with someone in your workplace, you may try to stay tight-lipped around them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在你的工作场所对某人生气，你可以试着在他们面前保持沉默。

sense_info_list.en: a thin piece of metal or plastic used to pluck the strings of a musical instrument
the person or thing perceived as the best in a particular group
eat food or a meal in small amounts or without much appetite
remove substances from inside
unlock without a key
criticize someone in a petty way

word_usage.usage: 表示“挑选某人/物做某事”可以说pick sb./sth. for sth.或pick sb. to do sth.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 挑选; 挑选出的物品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 接电话；挑选；接(人)；搭载；拿起；好转；提高；有起色；增加；变得更猛烈；变得更强大

sense_info_list.en: choose someone or something from a number of alternatives, typically after careful thought
sense_info_list.zh: 挑选; 挑选出的物品

examination_example.sentence: She recommends <highlight>picking</highlight> clothes that fit well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她建议挑选合身的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: The emergency services <highlight>picked</highlight> through the burnt debris.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 紧急救援人员在烧焦的废墟中搜寻。

sense_info_list.en: take hold of and lift or move
gather one by one

word_usage.usage:
表示从很多东西中“挑选出”应该说pick out。
示例：玛丽在店里花了很长一段时间才挑好一件新衣服。
误 It took Mary a long time to pick up a new dress at the store.
正 It took Mary a long time to pick out a new dress at the store.

pick up表示“拾起，捡起”，当宾语是代词时，习惯上把代词放在pick与up之间; 当宾语是名词时，一般放在pick up之后。
示例：(1) He picked up the old man's hat.
他捡起老人的帽子。
(2)  She saw a wallet lying on the ground and picked it up.
她看见地上有个钱包，就把它捡了起来。
pick如表示“摘, 拾”时，不可与副词up连用。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't mind, I'd like to <highlight>pick</highlight> your brains a bit more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不介意的话，我想再向你请教一下。

sense_info_list.en: gather one by one
choose someone or something from a number of alternatives; typically after careful thought

word_usage.usage:
pick up表示“拾起，捡起”，当宾语是代词时，习惯上把代词放在pick与up之间; 当宾语是名词时，一般放在pick up之后。
示例：(1) He picked up the old man's hat.
他捡起老人的帽子。
(2)  She saw a wallet lying on the ground and picked it up.
她看见地上有个钱包，就把它捡了起来。
pick如表示“摘, 拾”时，不可与副词up连用。

表示从很多东西中“挑选出”应该说pick out。
示例：玛丽在店里花了很长一段时间才挑好一件新衣服。
误 It took Mary a long time to pick up a new dress at the store.
正 It took Mary a long time to pick out a new dress at the store.

exam_freq_info.chinese: (pick up)(偶然)获得; 取得; 学会
摘掉; 剔除; 掐去

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 摘；采摘；采集；挑选；选择；拔；拉；撕；扯；挑；捡

examination_example.sentence: The researchers found the dogs were able to <highlight>pick</highlight> the angry or happy face by touching a picture of it with their noses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，狗可以用鼻子挑出一张愤怒或快乐的照片。

examination_example.sentence: Some nights my heart was breaking to have to <highlight>pick</highlight> between my kids and studying for exams or papers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些夜晚，我心碎了，不得不在孩子和准备考试或论文之间做出选择。

examination_example.sentence: In the store, I asked each of my kids to <highlight>pick</highlight> something they thought our "friend" there would appreciate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在商店里，我让我的每个孩子挑选一些他们认为我们的“朋友”会喜欢的东西。

examination_example.sentence: However, what my children want to do after school is <highlight>pick</highlight> up a screen—any screen—and stare at it for hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我的孩子们放学后想做的就是拿起一个屏幕——任何屏幕——盯着它看几个小时。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>picked</highlight> up the stem cells in Providence, Rhode Island, and was meant to fly to Washington then back to London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在罗德岛的普罗维登斯取到了干细胞，并打算飞往华盛顿，然后返回伦敦。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes this technique would not work, and I had to <highlight>pick</highlight> up the set and shake it to remove the sound.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时这种方法行不通，我不得不抬起电视机，摇晃它来消除声音。

examination_example.sentence: I smelt the flowers, looked at the birds, and yeah, I <highlight>picked</highlight> many tree leaves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我闻了闻花，看了看鸟，是的，我还摘了很多树叶。

examination_example.sentence: When summer comes, they will invite their students to <highlight>pick</highlight> the vegetables!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当夏天到来的时候，他们会邀请他们的学生来摘蔬菜！

sense_info_list.zh: (pick up)(偶然)获得; 取得; 学会

examination_example.sentence: Rustam <highlight>picked</highlight> up his colorful English in California.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Rustam在加利福尼亚学会了丰富多彩的英语。

examination_example.sentence: the skill she <highlight>picked</highlight> up in Wisconsin
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她在威斯康辛学到的技能

examination_example.sentence: Retired Workers Can <highlight>Pick</highlight> Up New Skills
examination_example.sentence_trans: 退休工人可以学习新技能

examination_example.sentence: Then I have to drive to the airport to <highlight>pick</highlight> up an advertiser at 11.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我必须在11点开车去机场接一个广告商。

examination_example.sentence: So, you don't need to come and <highlight>pick</highlight> me up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，你不用来接我了。

examination_example.sentence: But it <highlight>picks</highlight> up more shades of blue, yellow, and grey than humans do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但它比人类更能分辨蓝色、黄色和灰色。

examination_example.sentence: On our first morning in Paris, I went around the comer to the food market to <highlight>pick</highlight> up some groceries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在巴黎的第一个早晨，我绕过街角去菜市场买些杂货。

examination_example.sentence: We guess who is calling before we <highlight>pick</highlight> up the phone (using Caller ID would take the fun out of it).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们接电话之前，我们猜测是谁打来的（使用来电显示会剥夺这份乐趣）。

sense_info_list.zh: 摘掉; 剔除; 掐去

exam_freq_info.chinese: 挑选; 挑选出的物品
(pick up)接电话; 接受(信号; 声音)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 采摘；挑选；挑剔；（pick的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 摘；采摘；采集；挑选；选择；拔；拉；撕；扯；挑；捡

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 接电话；挑选；接(人)；搭载；拿起；好转；提高；有起色；增加；变得更猛烈；变得更强大

sense_info_list.en: take hold of and lift or move

examination_example.sentence: But chopsticks are not just simple tools to <highlight>pick</highlight> up food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是筷子不仅仅是简单的夹食物的工具。

examination_example.sentence: Please <highlight>pick</highlight> up the rubbish and put it into the proper rubbish bin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请把垃圾捡起来，放到合适的垃圾桶里。

examination_example.sentence: They boys <highlight>picked</highlight> up the clothes and put them away rapidly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男孩们拿起衣服，迅速把他们收好。

sense_info_list.en: choose someone or something from a number of alternatives, typically after careful thought
sense_info_list.zh: 挑选; 挑选出的物品

examination_example.sentence: Why do some people try hard to <highlight>pick</highlight> special names for their babies?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些人极力为自己的宝宝挑选特别的名字？

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>pick</highlight> the food and cook your meals, 'Mum said ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: “你可以挑选食物并做饭，”妈妈说。

examination_example.sentence: I often <highlight>pick</highlight> out some of my clothes which are out of style after going shopping.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我经常在购物后挑选一些过时的衣服。

sense_info_list.en: to take flowers, fruit, etc. from the plant or the tree where they are growing

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>picked</highlight> one flower, then went to find a friend who studied plants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我摘了一朵花，然后去找一个研究植物的朋友。

examination_example.sentence: In autumn, there's always fruit <highlight>picking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 秋天总是有水果采摘。

examination_example.sentence: After about three months, the bananas are ready to be <highlight>picked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约三个月后，香蕉就可以采摘了。

sense_info_list.en: to go somewhere in your car and collect somebody who is waiting for you

examination_example.sentence: I'll <highlight>pick</highlight> you up at the station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会在车站接你。

examination_example.sentence: I asked my father to <highlight>pick</highlight> me up at the school gate at 6:30.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我让父亲6:30到学校门口接我。

examination_example.sentence: I got up early this morning to <highlight>pick</highlight> up my grandma at the airport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天早上我起得很早去机场接我奶奶。

examination_example.sentence: All eyes will be on the 23-year-old girl to see if she will <highlight>pick</highlight> up two gold medals in Tokyo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的目光都将集中在这位23岁的女孩身上，看她是否会在东京获得两枚金牌。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>picked</highlight> up the engineering skills necessary to build her ROV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她学会了制造ROV(遥控潜水器)所需的工程技术。

examination_example.sentence: The knowledge and skills that you will need will be <highlight>picked</highlight> up along the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你将会在一路上学习你所需要的知识和技能。

sense_info_list.zh: (pick up)接电话; 接受(信号; 声音)

examination_example.sentence: No wonder you didn't <highlight>pick</highlight> it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 怪不得你没接电话。

examination_example.sentence: The bigger dish will be able to <highlight>pick</highlight> up weaker signals (信号).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 较大的天线将能够接收到较弱的信号。

examination_example.sentence: When visitors <highlight>pick</highlight> up the phone, they can listen to oral(口述) histories of immigration from the newest New Yorkers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当游客拿起电话时，他们可以听到来自最新纽约人的移民口述历史。

sense_info_list.en: a thin piece of metal or plastic used to pluck the strings of a musical instrument

examination_example.sentence: It is usually used to play Russian music by plucking the strings with fingers or a <highlight>pick</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它通常用来演奏俄罗斯音乐，用手指或镐拨弄琴弦。

examination_example.sentence: Without knowing where he was, the boy was <highlight>picking</highlight> out Twinkle, Twinkle, Little star.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并不知道自己在那里，男孩弹奏起了《一闪一闪小星星》

sense_info_list.en: to pull or remove something or small pieces of something from something else, especially with your fingers

examination_example.sentence: The leaves must be <highlight>picked</highlight> before the flowers come out or they will not taste good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 叶子必须在花开之前摘下来，否则味道会不好。

word_usage.usage:
表示从很多东西中“挑选出”应该说pick out。
示例：玛丽在店里花了很长一段时间才挑好一件新衣服。
误 It took Mary a long time to pick up a new dress at the store.
正 It took Mary a long time to pick out a new dress at the store.

pick up表示“拾起，捡起”，当宾语是代词时，习惯上把代词放在pick与up之间; 当宾语是名词时，一般放在pick up之后。
示例：(1) He picked up the old man's hat.
他捡起老人的帽子。
(2) She saw a wallet lying on the ground and picked it up.
她看见地上有个钱包，就把它捡了起来。
pick如表示“摘, 拾”时，不可与副词up连用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行挑选，侧重于被选者的优点。
口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含随意或慎重选择之意。
